verses.verse: Brothers,<WG80> my<WG1699> heart<WG2588>'s desire<WG2107> and<WG2532> my prayer<WG1162> to<WG4314> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> for<WG5228> Israel,<WG2474> that<WG1519> they may be saved.<WG4991>
For<WG1063> I testify<WG3140> about<WG3140> them<WG846> that<WG3754> they have<WG2192> a zeal<WG2205> for God,<WG2316> but<WG235> not<WG3756> according to<WG2596> knowledge.<WG1922>

For<WG1063> being ignorant of<WG50> God<WG2316>'s righteousness,<WG1343> and<WG2532> seeking<WG2212> to establish<WG2476> their own<WG2398> righteousness,<WG1343> they<WG5293> didn't<WG3756> subject themselves<WG5293> to the righteousness<WG1343> of God.<WG2316>
For<WG1063> Christ<WG5547> is the fulfillment<WG5056> of the law<WG3551> for<WG1519> righteousness<WG1343> to everyone<WG3956> who believes.<WG4100>

For<WG1063> Moses<WG3475> writes<WG1125> about the righteousness<WG1343> of<WG1537> the law,<WG3551> <WG3754> "The one<WG444> who<WG3754> does<WG4160> them<WG846> will live<WG2198> by<WG1722> them.<WG846>"

But<WG1161> the righteousness<WG1343> which is of<WG1537> faith<WG4102> says<WG3004> this,<WG3779> "Don't<WG3361> say<WG2036> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> heart,<WG2588> <WG5101> 'Who will ascend<WG305> into<WG1519> heaven?<WG3772>' (that<WG5124> is,<WG2076> to bring<WG2609> Christ<WG5547> down<WG2609>);
or,<WG2228> <WG5101> 'Who will descend<WG2597> into<WG1519> the abyss?<WG12>' (that<WG5124> is,<WG2076> to bring Christ<WG5547> up<WG321> <WG321> from<WG1537> the dead.<WG3498>)"

But<WG235> what<WG5101> does it<WG3004> say?<WG4487> "The word is<WG2076> near<WG1451> you,<WG4675> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> mouth,<WG4750> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> heart;<WG2588>" that<WG5124> is,<WG2076> the word<WG4487> of faith,<WG4102> which<WG3739> we preach:<WG2784>

that<WG3754> if<WG1437> you will confess<WG3670> with<WG1722> your<WG4675> mouth<WG4750> that Jesus<WG2424> is Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> believe<WG4100> in<WG1722> your<WG4675> heart<WG2588> that<WG3754> God<WG2316> raised<WG1453> him<WG846> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> you will be saved.<WG4982>
For<WG1063> with the heart,<WG2588> one believes<WG4100> unto<WG1519> righteousness;<WG1343> and<WG1161> with the mouth<WG4750> confession is made<WG3670> unto<WG1519> salvation.<WG4991>
For<WG1063> the Scripture<WG1124> says,<WG3004> "Whoever<WG3956> believes<WG4100> in<WG1909> him<WG846> will<WG2617> not<WG3756> be disappointed.<WG2617>"

For<WG1063> there is<WG2076> no<WG3756> distinction<WG1293> between<WG5037> Jew<WG2453> and<WG2532> Greek;<WG1672> for<WG1063> the<WG2962> same<WG846> Lord is Lord<WG2962> of all,<WG3956> and is rich<WG4147> to<WG1519> all<WG3956> who call on<WG1941> him.<WG846>
For,<WG1063> <WG302> "Whoever<WG3956> will call on<WG1941> the name<WG3686> of the Lord<WG2962> will be saved.<WG4982>"

How<WG4459> then<WG3767> will they call on him<WG1941> in<WG1519> whom<WG3739> they have<WG4100> not<WG3756> believed?<WG4100> <WG1161> How<WG4459> will they believe<WG4100> in him whom<WG3739> they have<WG191> not<WG3756> heard?<WG191> <WG1161> How<WG4459> will they hear<WG191> without<WG5565> a preacher?<WG2784>

And<WG1161> how<WG4459> will they preach<WG1437> unless<WG3361> they are sent?<WG649> As<WG2531> it is written:<WG1125> "How<WG5613> beautiful<WG5611> are the feet<WG4228> of those who preach the Good News<WG2097> of peace,<WG1515> who bring glad tidings<WG2097> of good things!<WG18>"

But<WG235> they<WG5219> didn't<WG3756> all<WG3956> listen<WG5219> to the glad news.<WG2098> For<WG1063> Isaiah<WG2268> says,<WG3004> "Lord,<WG2962> who<WG5101> has believed<WG4100> our<WG2257> report?<WG189>"
So<WG686> faith<WG4102> comes by<WG1537> hearing,<WG189> and<WG1161> hearing<WG189> by<WG1223> the word<WG4487> of God.<WG2316>

But<WG235> I say,<WG3361> didn't<WG3756> they<WG191> hear?<WG191> Yes,<WG3304> most certainly, "Their<WG846> sound<WG5353> went<WG1831> out into<WG1519> all<WG3956> the earth,<WG1093> <WG2532> their<WG846> words<WG4487> to<WG1519> the ends<WG4009> of the world.<WG3625>"

But<WG235> I ask,<WG3361> <WG1097> didn't<WG3756> Israel<WG2474> know?<WG1097> First<WG4413> Moses<WG3475> says,<WG3361> "I<WG1473> will provoke<WG3863> you<WG5209> to jealousy<WG3863> with<WG1909> that which is no<WG3756> nation,<WG1484> with<WG1909> a nation<WG1484> void of understanding<WG801> I will make you<WG5209> angry.<WG3949>"

<WG1161> Isaiah<WG2268> is very bold,<WG662> and<WG2532> says,<WG3004> "I was found<WG2147> by those<WG3588> who didn't<WG3361> seek<WG2212> me.<WG1691> I was<WG1096> revealed<WG1717> to those<WG3588> who didn't<WG3361> ask<WG1905> for<WG1905> me.<WG1691>"

But<WG1161> as to<WG4314> Israel<WG2474> he says,<WG3004> "All<WG3650> day long<WG2250> I stretched out<WG1600> my<WG3450> hands<WG5495> to<WG4314> a disobedient<WG544> and<WG2532> contrary<WG483> people.<WG2992>"
